title: The Symbolism of the Mercury: A Journey Through Inner Consciousness.
first_phrase: In the previous section, the author analyzed the symbolism of the composite symbol of the cross of elements dominated by the F circle, which represents the contracted vision of the world influenced by our trances. The author then explained the correlation of our biological self with the autonomous nervous system and the endocrine glands, which are represented by the Indian chakra system. Continuing with the symbolic analysis, the author discussed the "mercury" symbol and its various elements that represent generative energy and development. This section concludes with the importance of the vertical symbol E in the alignment and stabilization of our presence, leading to the final perception of non-duality.
